info.sourceTextContent: Era una Magdalena, una infeliz arrepentida... Lo que más le duele, hijo, es haberte engañado. No debes tratarla mal; no debes ensañarte con ella, porque su dolor es muy grande... cree que la vas a matar... Ya le he dicho que no eres un Otelo y que no te dará tan fuerte.
info.suspiciousTextContent: It was a Magdalene, an unhappy sorry ... What hurts him most, son, is Having A deceived. You should not treat it bad, you must not ensañarte with it because their pain is great ... believes that going to kill ... I told you're not a Otelo and you do not give as strong
